entry.summary: Re Of course funding rates could flip especially as the airdrop comes closer and $BLUR stakers decide they want to hedge their exposure. But this can nevertheless be an interesting second option to farm the airdrop that we wanted to present.

entry.title: Not only did we get $BLUR but a new airdrop target appeared. What is @Blast_L2 ? It's a new Ethereum L2 by Blur founder @PacmanBlur It complements Blu...
entry.summary:
Not only did we get $BLUR but a new airdrop target appeared. What is @Blast_L2 ? It's a new Ethereum L2 by Blur founder @PacmanBlur It complements Blur and will help Blur achieve its vision to offer seamless NFT perps and trading. But there's moreðŸ‘‡ https://x.com/Blast_L2/status/1726747087906464024?s=20
